actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 1 piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

traits.description: The bat can't use its blindsight while deafened.
traits.name: Echolocation

traits.description: The bat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.
traits.name: Keen Hearing
